title: The CEO’s Pregnant Wife - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Childcare   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Modern Day   Pregnancy   R*pe Victim Becomes Lover   R*pe   S*xual Abuse   Time Skip   Wealthy Characters
author: Qian Cao   千草
description:
Super troublesome!

Since when was being pregnant easier than buying fresh vegetables? Alright, alright, she did admit herself that she had been muddleheaded, but this man really does not have any sense of commitment.

As the host of the night club, not only is he bad at servicing others, his ‘skill’ turned out to be deadly worse.

It pained her to death, and by that time her mood had already turned sour.

She will absolutely report this to Customer Association.

But… but… he wasn’t a host after all!

Furthermore, to her surprise, the worse thing that was to transpire was that she had become pregnant with his child!

The next chronology is big. The most misfortune thing was that she was his only antidote.

Hu hu hu, someone tell her, what should she do in order to free herself from this big dilemma?>
